title: Hydroxyapatite/urea hybrid materials: what is the basis for the enhanced nutrient efficiency?

The growing demand for food production worldwide has led to the increased use of fertilizers contributing to a range of environmental problems. To reduce these problems, the development of urea-hydroxyapatite...
